thread.title: ‘Self-indulgent speech’: Viola Davis left out a few professions in her #Oscars speech – twitchy.com
thread.title_full: ‘Self-indulgent speech’: Viola Davis left out a few professions in her #Oscars speech – twitchy.com

author: Posted At Pm On February
title: ‘Self-indulgent speech’: Viola Davis left out a few professions in her #Oscars speech – twitchy.com
text:
— Marc Burleigh (@marcburleigh) February 27, 2017 
Viola Davis just won the Oscar for Best Supporting Actress for her role “Fences,” but it’s this line from her acceptance speech that has conservatives on Twitter talking right now: . @violadavis says Hollywood is "the only profession that celebrates what it means to live a life". #Absurd 
— Richard Grenell (@RichardGrenell) February 27, 2017 
Video here: Viola Davis: "We are the only profession that celebrates what it means to live a life." #Oscars pic.twitter.com/TjRcj3cIw2 
— Kyle Griffin (@kylegriffin1) February 27, 2017 Trending
